displayName.portuguese: Quero Saber o que é o Amor
displayName.polish: Czy to jest przyjaźń? Czy to jest kochanie?
displayName.danish: Jeg vil gerne vide, hvad kærlighed er

description.english: Finish the tutorial.
description.german: Schließe die Einführung ab.
description.french: Terminer le didacticiel.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial.
description.koreana: 튜토리얼을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial.
description.schinese: 完成教程。
description.tchinese: 完成教程。

description.japanese: チュートリアルを完了する。
description.portuguese: Conclui o tutorial.
description.polish: Ukończ samouczek.
description.danish: Afslut vejledningen.
description.dutch: Voltooi de tutorial.
description.norwegian: Fullfør veiledningen
description.swedish: Slutför guiden.
description.turkish: Eğitim görevini bitir.

description.english: Beat any level in two player mode.
description.german: Schließe eine beliebige Zone im Zwei-Spieler-Modus ab.
description.french: Terminer n'importe quel niveau en mode 2 Joueurs.
description.italian: Completa un livello in modalità due giocatori.
description.koreana: 2인용 모드에서 아무 레벨이나 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Supera cualquier nivel en modo de dos jugadores.
description.schinese: 以双人模式通过任一关卡。
description.tchinese: 以雙人模式通過任一關卡。
description.russian: Завершите любой уровень в режиме для двух игроков.
description.japanese: 2 プレイヤーモードのレベルをクリアする。
description.portuguese: Vence qualquer nível no modo de dois jogadores.
description.polish: Ukończ dowolny poziom w trybie dla dwóch graczy.
description.danish: Fuldfør et niveau i dueltilstanden.
description.dutch: Voltooi een willekeurig level in het speltype voor twee spelers.
description.norwegian: Fullfør et nivå i tospillermodus.
description.swedish: Klara valfri nivå i tvåspelarläge.
description.turkish: Her seviyeyi ikili oyuncu modunda geç.
description.brazilian: Concluir qualquer nível no modo dois jogadores.

displayName.spanish: El mejor amigo del hombre espacial
displayName.japanese: スペース マンの親友
displayName.portuguese: Melhor Amigo do Homem do Espaço

description.english: Beat any level with the help of your trusty space-pet.
description.german: Schließe eine beliebige Zone mit deinem Weltraumbegleiter ab.
description.french: Terminer n'importe quel niveau aidé de votre fidèle compère stellaire.
description.italian: Completa un livello con l'aiuto del tuo fidato cucciolo spaziale.
description.koreana: 충직한 스페이스펫의 도움을 받아 아무 레벨이나 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Supera cualquier nivel con la ayuda de tu mascota espacial.
description.schinese: 在您值得信赖的太空宠物的帮助下通过任一关卡。
description.tchinese: 在您值得信賴的太空寵物的幫助下通過任一關卡。
description.russian: Завершите любой уровень вместе с верным космическим питомцем.
description.japanese: スペース ペットの手を借りてレベルをクリアする。
description.portuguese: Vence qualquer nível com a ajuda do teu fiel animal de estimação espacial.
description.polish: Ukończ dowolny poziom z pomocą swojego zaufanego kosmicznego zwierzaka.
description.danish: Fuldfør et niveau med hjælp fra dit trofaste rumkæledyr.
description.dutch: Voltooi een level met behulp van je trouwe ruimtehuisdier.
description.finnish: Selvitä mikä tahansa taso uskollisen avaruuslemmikkisi avulla.
description.norwegian: Fullfør et nivå med ditt pålitelige romdyr.
description.swedish: Klara valfri nivå med hjälp av ditt trogna rymd-husdjur.
description.turkish: Her seviyeyi güvenilir uzay hayvanının yardımıyla geç.
description.brazilian: Concluir qualquer nível com a ajuda do seu fiel bichinho-espacial.

displayName.french: Quand l'ours passe à la casserole

description.english: Defeat King Cepheus.
description.german: Besiege König Kepheus.
description.french: Battre le Roi Céphée.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Cefeo.
description.koreana: 킹 케페우스를 무찌르세요.
description.spanish: Derrota al rey Cefeo.

description.tchinese: 擊敗仙王座。
description.russian: Победите Короля Цефея.
description.japanese: ケフェウス座を倒す。

description.danish: Vind over Kong Cepheus.
description.dutch: Versla koning Cepheus.
description.norwegian: Beseire Kefeus.
description.swedish: Besegra kung Cepheus.
description.turkish: Kral Cepheus'u yen.
description.brazilian: Derrotar Rei Cefeu.

description.english: Finish a level after removing all fog of war.
description.german: Schließe eine Zone ab, nachdem du sie erkundet hast (kein Nebel des Krieges mehr).
description.french: Terminer un niveau après l'avoir exploré en entier.
description.italian: Completa un livello dopo aver eliminato tutta la nebbia di guerra.
description.koreana: 안개를 모두 제거한 후 레벨을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Termina un nivel tras disipar toda la niebla de guerra.
description.schinese: 消除全部战争迷雾后完成关卡。
description.tchinese: 消除全部戰爭迷霧後完成關卡。
description.russian: Развейте весь туман войны, а затем завершите уровень.
description.japanese: 戦場の霧をすべて消してレベルを完了する。
description.portuguese: Conclui um nível depois de removeres toda a névoa da guerra.
description.polish: Ukończ poziom, pozbywając się całej mgły wojny.
description.danish: Afslut et niveau efter at have fejet krigstågen væk.
description.dutch: Voltooi een level nadat alle oorlogsnevel verdwenen is.
description.finnish: Suorita taso loppuun poistettuasi kaiken sotasumun.
description.norwegian: Fullfør et nivå etter du har fjernet all krigståken.
description.swedish: Klara en nivå efter att ha avlägsnat all dimma.
description.turkish: Savaşın dumanını temizledikten sonra seviyeyi bitir.
description.brazilian: Terminar um nível depois de eliminar toda a névoa de guerra.

description.english: Finish a level without taking damage.
description.german: Schließe eine Zone ab, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
description.french: Terminer un niveau sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Completa un livello senza subire danni.
description.koreana: 피해를 입지 않고 레벨을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Termina un nivel sin sufrir daño.
description.schinese: 完成一个关卡，且未受伤害。
description.tchinese: 完成一個關卡，且未受傷害。
description.russian: Завершите уровень, не получив повреждений.
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにレベルを完了する。
description.portuguese: Conclui um nível sem sofreres danos.
description.polish: Ukończ poziom, nie odnosząc obrażeń.
description.danish: Afslut et niveau uden at pådrage dig skader.
description.dutch: Voltooi een level zonder schade op te lopen.
description.norwegian: Fullfør et nivå uten å ta skade.
description.swedish: Klara en nivå utan att ta skada.
description.turkish: Seviyeyi hasar almadan bitir.
description.brazilian: Terminar um nível sem tomar dano.

description.english: Finish a level without crossing paths with your partner.
description.german: Schließe eine Zone ab, ohne dass sich die Wege von deinem Partner und dir kreuzen.
description.french: Terminer un niveau sans que vous et votre partenaire ne vous croisiez.
description.italian: Completa un livello senza incrociarti con il tuo compagno.
description.koreana: 파트너의 경로를 침범하지 않고 레벨을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Termina un nivel sin cruzarte con tu compi.
description.schinese: 完成一个关卡，且未与伙伴交叉换位。
description.tchinese: 完成一個關卡，且未與夥伴交叉換位。
description.russian: Завершите уровень, ни разу не пересекшись с партнером.
description.japanese: パートナーと会わずにレベルを完了する。
description.portuguese: Conclui um nível sem te atravessares no caminho do teu companheiro.
description.polish: Ukończ poziom, nie spotykając swojej drugiej połowy.
description.danish: Afslut et niveau uden at løbe på din partner.
description.dutch: Voltooi een level zonder je partner tegen te komen.
description.finnish: Suorita taso loppuun kohtaamatta kumppanisi kanssa.
description.norwegian: Fullfør et nivå uten å røre partneren din.
description.swedish: Klara en nivå utan att korsa din partners väg.
description.turkish: Seviyeyi yolun partnerinle kesişmeden bitir.
description.brazilian: Terminar um nível sem cruzar caminho com seu parceiro.

description.english: Fill up all gem slots in a fully upgraded ship.
description.german: Setze in einem komplett aufgewerteten Schiff Juwelen in jedem Platz ein.
description.french: Sertir tous les emplacements de gemmes dans un vaisseau amélioré au maximum.
description.italian: Riempi tutti gli slot delle gemme in una nave potenziata al massimo.
description.koreana: 완전히 업그레이드된 우주선에서 보석 슬롯을 모두 채우세요.
description.spanish: Llena todas las ranuras de gemas en una nave totalmente mejorada.
description.schinese: 在一艘全面升级的战舰上，填补所有宝石槽。
description.tchinese: 在一艘全面升級的戰艦上，填補所有寶石槽。
description.russian: Заполните все слоты под кристаллы в полностью улучшенном корабле.
description.japanese: 完全アップグレードした船でジェムスロットをすべて埋める。
description.portuguese: Enche todos os espaços de pedras preciosas numa nave completamente expandida.
description.polish: Zapełnij wszystkie miejsca na klejnoty w całkowicie ulepszonym statku.
description.danish: Fyld dit fuldt opgraderede rumskib med ædelsten.
description.dutch: Vul alle edelsteenopeningen in een volledig geüpgraded schip.
description.finnish: Täytä kaikki jalokivipaikat täysin päivitetyssä aluksessa.
description.norwegian: Fyll alle juvelsporene i et helt oppgradert skip.
description.swedish: Fyll upp alla ädelstenar i ett fullt uppgraderat skepp.
description.turkish: Tam yükseltilmiş gemideki tüm mücevher bölmelerini doldur.
description.brazilian: Preencher todos os espaços de joia de uma nave com todos os upgrades.

description.english: Play through a campaign without using any gems.
description.german: Schließe eine Kampagne ab, ohne Juwelen zu benutzen.
description.french: Terminer une expédition sans utiliser de gemmes.
description.italian: Gioca un'intera campagna senza usare gemme.
description.koreana: 보석을 사용하지 않고 캠페인을 마무리하세요.
description.spanish: Juega una campaña sin usar gemas.
description.schinese: 完成战役，且未动用一颗宝石。
description.tchinese: 完成戰役，且未動用一顆寶石。
description.russian: Пройдите кампанию, не используя кристаллы.
description.japanese: ジェムを使わずにキャンペーンをプレイする。
description.portuguese: Joga uma campanha sem usares pedras preciosas.
description.polish: Przejdź kampanię, nie używając klejnotów.
description.danish: Fuldfør en kampagne uden at bruge ædelsten.
description.dutch: Voltooi een campagne zonder edelstenen te gebruiken.
description.finnish: Pelaa kampanja läpi käyttämättä yhtään jalokiveä.
description.norwegian: Spill gjennom en kampanje uten å bruke noen juveler.
description.swedish: Spela genom en kampanj utan att använda en ädelsten.
description.turkish: Kampanyayı mücevher kullanmadan oyna.
description.brazilian: Jogar uma campanha sem usar nenhuma joia.

description.english: Earn one of each type of ship badge.
description.german: Erhalte jede Art von Schiffsabzeichen.
description.french: Obtenir un exemplaire de chaque insigne de vaisseau.
description.italian: Guadagna un badge della nave di ciascun tipo.
description.koreana: 모든 유형의 우주선 배지를 하나씩 받으세요.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las clases de distintivos de nave.
description.schinese: 每类战舰的徽章都赚取一枚。
description.tchinese: 每類戰艦的徽章都賺取一枚。
description.russian: Получите хотя бы один значок кораблей каждого вида.
description.japanese: 宇宙船バッジを全種類獲得する。
description.portuguese: Ganha um exemplar de cada tipo de distintivo para naves.
description.polish: Zdobądź po jednej odznace statku każdego rodzaju.
description.danish: Få fat i et rumskibsemblem af hver type.
description.dutch: Verdien een exemplaar van elk type scheepsbadge.
description.norwegian: Få et av hver type skipsmerke
description.swedish: Vinn en skeppsmedalj av varje sort.
description.turkish: Her çeşit gemi rozetinden birer tane kazan.
description.brazilian: Ganhar cada um dos tipos de emblemas de navio.

displayName.german: Ob groß, ob klein, alle sollen Freunde sein
displayName.spanish: Todas las criaturas grandes y pequeñas
displayName.portuguese: Todas as Criaturas Grandes e Pequenas
displayName.brazilian: Todas as Criaturas, Grandes e Pequenas

description.english: Rescue every captured friend.
description.german: Rette jeden gefangenen Freund.
description.french: Secourir tous les amis capturés.
description.italian: Salva tutti gli amici catturati.
description.koreana: 납치된 친구를 모두 구출하세요.
description.spanish: Rescata a todos los amigos capturados.
description.schinese: 救出每位被俘的朋友。
description.tchinese: 救出每位被俘的朋友。
description.russian: Спасите всех захваченных друзей.
description.japanese: 捕まったフレンドを全員救出する。
description.portuguese: Salva todos os amigos capturados.
description.polish: Ocal wszystkich uwięzionych przyjaciół.
description.danish: Red alle tilfangetagne venner.
description.dutch: Bevrijd al je gevangengenomen vriendjes.
description.norwegian: Redd alle de fangede vennene dine.
description.swedish: Rädda alla vänner i fångenskap.
description.turkish: Yakalanan her arkadaşını kurtar.
description.brazilian: Resgatar cada amigo capturado.

displayName.swedish: Väck inte den björn som sover

description.english: Defeat Ursa Major without taking a punch.
description.german: Besiege den großen Bären, ohne einen Schlag zu kassieren.
description.french: Battre la Grande Ourse sans prendre un seul coup de poing.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Orsa maggiore senza subire colpi.
description.koreana: 펀치를 맞지 않고 우르사 메이저를 무찌르세요.
description.spanish: Derrota a Osa Mayor sin recibir un puñetazo.
description.schinese: 击败大熊座，且未挨一拳。
description.tchinese: 擊敗大熊座，且未挨一拳。
description.russian: Победите Большую Медведицу, не пострадав от ее ударов.
description.japanese: パンチしないでおおぐま座を倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrota a Ursa Maior sem que ela te atinja.
description.polish: Pokonaj Wielką Niedźwiedzicę, nie otrzymując żadnego ciosu.
description.danish: Vind over Store Bjørn uden at blive ramt.
description.dutch: Versla Ursa Major zonder geraakt te worden door haar stoten.
description.finnish: Päihitä Iso karhu saamatta yhtään iskua.
description.norwegian: Beseire Store bjørn uten å ta imot et slag.
description.swedish: Besegra Ursa Major utan att få en smäll.
description.turkish: Ursa Major'ü yumruk yemeden yen.
description.brazilian: Derrotar Ursa Maior sem receber um soco.

description.english: Defeat Cetus while its head is underwater.
description.german: Besiege den Walfisch, während er abgetaucht ist.
description.french: Battre la Baleine pendant qu'elle a la tête sous l'eau.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Balena mentre ha la testa sott'acqua.
description.koreana: 세투스의 머리가 수중에 있는 동안 세투스를 무찌르세요.
description.spanish: Derrota a Cetus cuando tenga la cabeza bajo el agua.
description.schinese: 趁它的头仍在水下时，击败鲸鱼座。
description.tchinese: 趁它的頭仍在水下時，擊敗鯨魚座。
description.russian: Победите Кита, когда его голова находится под водой.
description.japanese: くじら座の頭が水中にあるうちに倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrota Cetus quando tiver a cabeça debaixo de água.
description.polish: Pokonaj Wieloryba, gdy jego głowa będzie pod wodą.
description.danish: Vind over Hvalfisken, mens den har hovedet i vandet.
description.dutch: Versla Cetus terwijl zijn hoofd onder water is.
description.finnish: Päihitä Valaskala sen pään ollessa veden alla.
description.norwegian: Beseire Hvalfisken mens den har hodet under vann.
description.swedish: Besegra Cetus när huvudet är under vatten.
description.turkish: Cetus'u başı suyun altındayken yen.
description.brazilian: Derrotar Cetus enquanto sua cabeça estiver submersa.

description.english: Deliver the final blow to Orion using a solar flare.
description.german: Besiege Orion mit einer Sonneneruption.
description.french: Asséner le coup fatal à Orion avec une projection solaire.
description.italian: Infliggi il colpo di grazia a Orione con una sfera solare.
description.koreana: 솔라 플레어를 사용하여 오리온에게 결정타를 날리세요.
description.spanish: Propina el golpe definitivo a Orión usando una erupción solar.
description.schinese: 利用太阳耀斑，给猎户座致命一击。
description.tchinese: 利用太陽耀斑，給獵戶座致命一擊。
description.russian: Нанесите Ориону последний удар солнечной вспышкой.
description.japanese: 太陽フレアを使っているオリオン座にとどめを刺す。
description.portuguese: Aplica o golpe de misericórdia em Órion usando uma erupção solar.
description.polish: Zadaj ostatni cios Orionowi za pomocą słonecznego rozbłysku.
description.danish: Giv Orion det endelige stød med en intens solstråle.
description.dutch: Breng Orion de genadeklap toe met een zonnevlam.
description.finnish: Anna viimeinen isku Orionille käyttämällä auringonpurkausta.
description.norwegian: Gi det dødelige støtet til Orion med solerupsjon.
description.swedish: Gör slut på Orion genom att använda ett eldklot från solen.
description.turkish: Bir güneş patlaması kullanarak Orion'a son darbeyi indir.
description.brazilian: Dar o golpe final em Órion usando uma explosão solar.

description.english: Remove all of King Cepheus's shields.
description.german: Zerstöre alle Schilde von König Kepheus.
description.french: Détruire tous les boucliers du Roi Céphée.
description.italian: Distruggi tutti gli scudi di Cefeo.
description.koreana: 킹 케페우스의 쉴드를 모두 제거하세요.
description.spanish: Elimina todos los escudos del rey Cefeo.
description.schinese: 消除仙王座的所有盾牌。
description.tchinese: 消除仙王座的所有盾牌。
description.russian: Уничтожьте все щиты Короля Цефея.
description.japanese: ケフェウス座のシールドをすべて消す。
description.portuguese: Remove todos os escudos do Rei Cefeu.
description.polish: Pozbaw króla Cefeusza wszystkich osłon.
description.danish: Få fat i alle Kong Cepheus' skjolde.
description.dutch: Verwijder alle schilden van koning Cepheus.
description.norwegian: Fjern alle skjoldene til Kefeus.
description.swedish: Ta bort alla kung Cepheus sköldar.
description.turkish: Kral Cepheus'un tüm kalkanlarını çıkar.
description.brazilian: Remover todos os escudos de Rei Cefeu.

description.english: Use every station in a single level.
description.german: Benutze in einer Zone jede Station.
description.french: Utiliser tous les postes du vaisseau dans un niveau.
description.italian: Usa tutte le stazioni in uno stesso livello.
description.koreana: 단일 레벨에서 모든 스테이션을 사용하세요.
description.spanish: Usa todos los puestos de la nave en un mismo nivel.
description.schinese: 利用一个关卡中的每个控制台。
description.tchinese: 利用一個關卡中的每個控制站。
description.russian: Воспользуйтесь каждой станцией хотя бы один раз во время прохождения уровня.
description.japanese: 1つのレベルですべてのステーションを使用する。
description.portuguese: Usa todas as estações num único nível.
description.polish: Użyj wszystkich stacji na jednym poziomie.
description.danish: Brug alle kampstationer på et enkelt niveau.
description.dutch: Gebruik elk station in een level.
description.norwegian: Bruk alle stasjonene i løpet av et nivå.
description.swedish: Använd varje station i en nivå.
description.turkish: Tek bir seviyede her istasyonu kullan.
description.brazilian: Usar todas as estações em um único nível.

description.english: Pirouette 15 times in a single level.
description.german: Schaffe in einer Zone 15 Pirouetten.
description.french: Faire 15 pirouettes dans un niveau.
description.italian: Piroetta 15 volte in uno stesso livello.
description.koreana: 단일 레벨에서 피루엣 15번을 하세요.
description.spanish: Da 15 piruetas en un mismo nivel.
description.schinese: 在一个关卡中回旋 15 次。
description.tchinese: 在一個關卡中迴旋 15 次。
description.russian: Сделайте 15 пируэтов на одном уровне.
description.japanese: 1つのレベルで15回ピルエットする。
description.portuguese: Faz piruetas 15 vezes num único nível.
description.polish: Wykonaj piruet 15 razy na jednym poziomie.
description.danish: Udfør en piruet 15 gange på et enkelt niveau.
description.dutch: Maak 15 pirouettes in één level.
description.finnish: Tee piruetti 15 kertaa yhden tason aikana.
description.norwegian: Gjør 15 pirruetter i løpet av et nivå
description.swedish: Gör en piruett 15 gånger i en nivå.
description.turkish: Tek bir seviyede tek ayak üzerinde 15 kere dön.
description.brazilian: Fazer 15 piruetas em um único nível.

description.english: Throw a gem into a station that is being used by another player.
description.german: Wirf ein Juwel in eine Station, die von einem anderen Spieler genutzt wird.
description.french: Sertir une gemme dans un poste occupé par un autre joueur.
description.italian: Lancia una gemma in una stazione usata da un altro giocatore.
description.koreana: 다른 플레이어가 사용 중인 스테이션에 보석을 던지세요.
description.spanish: Lanza una gema a un puesto que esté usando otro jugador.
description.schinese: 将宝石抛入另一玩家正在使用的控制台。
description.tchinese: 將寶石拋入另一玩家正在使用的控制台。
description.russian: Бросьте кристалл в станцию, используемую другим игроком.
description.japanese: 他のプレイヤーが使用中のステーションにジェムを投げ入れる。
description.portuguese: Atira uma pedra preciosa para uma estação que esteja a ser usada por outro jogador.
description.polish: Wrzuć klejnot na stację, z której korzysta inny gracz.
description.danish: Kast en ædelsten ind i en anden spillers kampstation.
description.dutch: Gooi een edelsteen in een station dat gebruikt wordt door een andere speler.
description.finnish: Heitä jalokivi toisen pelaajan käytössä olevaan asemaan.
description.norwegian: Kast en juvel på en stasjon som brukes av partneren din.
description.swedish: Kasta en ädelsten in i en station som används av en annan spelare.
description.turkish: Başka oyuncu tarafından kullanılan istasyona bir mücevher at.
description.brazilian: Jogar uma joia numa estação que está sendo usada por outro jogador.

description.english: Have 10 unused gems in your ship at one time.
description.german: Verfüge gleichzeitig über 10 ungenutzte Juwelen auf deinem Schiff.
description.french: Avoir 10 gemmes inutilisées dans le vaisseau en même temps.
description.italian: Accumula 10 gemme non usate simultaneamente nella tua nave.
description.koreana: 한 번에 사용하지 않은 보석 10개를 우주선에 보유하세요.
description.spanish: Ten 10 gemas sin usar en tu nave al mismo tiempo.
description.schinese: 你的船上同时有10颗未用的宝石。
description.tchinese: 你的船上同時有10顆未用的寶石。
description.russian: Соберите 10 неиспользуемых кристаллов на корабле.
description.japanese: 自分の宇宙船に未使用のジェムを10個保有する。
description.portuguese: Tem 10 pedras preciosas não utilizadas na tua nave em qualquer altura.
description.polish: Miej 10 nieużywanych klejnotów na swoim statku.
description.danish: Udstyr dit rumskib med 10 ubrugte ædelsten.
description.dutch: Heb 10 ongebruikte edelstenen in je schip.
description.finnish: Pidä kymmentä käyttämätöntä jalokiveä aluksessasi samanaikaisesti.
description.norwegian: Ha 10 ubrukte juveler på skipet samtidig.
description.swedish: Ha 10 oanvända ädelstenar samtidigt i ditt skepp.
description.turkish: Geminde aynı anda 10 kullanılmayan mücevher bulundur.
description.brazilian: Ter 10 joias não usadas na sua nave ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Use three different types of Yamato weapons in a boss fight.
description.german: Setze in einem Bosskampf drei verschiedene Arten von Yamato-Waffen ein.
description.french: Utiliser 3 types d'armes Yamato différents pendant un combat contre un boss.
description.italian: Usa tre diversi tipi di armi Yamato in un combattimento boss.
description.koreana: 보스전에서 야마토 무기 세 가지를 사용하세요.
description.spanish: Usa tres tipos diferentes de armas Yamato luchando contra un jefe.
description.schinese: 在Boss大战中使用三种不同类型的大和武器。
description.tchinese: 在Boss大戰中使用三種不同類型的大和武器。
description.russian: Используйте три разных орудия «Ямато» в битве с боссом.
description.japanese: ボス戦でヤマト武器を3種類使用する。
description.portuguese: Usa três tipos diferentes de armas Yamato num combate com um chefe.
description.polish: Użyj trzech różnych typów broni Yamato w walce z bossem.
description.danish: Brug tre forskellige typer Yamato-våben i en bosskamp.
description.dutch: Gebruik drie verschillende Yamato-wapens in een baasgevecht.
description.norwegian: Bruk tre forskjellige typer Yamato-våpen i en sjefskamp.
description.swedish: Använd tre typer av Yamato-vapen i en boss-strid.
description.turkish: Bos savaşında birbirinden farklı üç tip Yamato silahı kullan.
description.brazilian: Usar três tipos diferentes de armas Yamato numa luta com um chefe.

description.english: Escape a white dwarf without shooting or ramming it.
description.german: Entkomme einem Weißen Zwerg, ohne ihn abzuschießen oder zu rammen.
description.french: S'échapper d'une naine blanche sans tirer ni foncer dessus.
description.italian: Sfuggi a una nana bianca senza spararle né caricarla.
description.koreana: 사격하거나 돌파하지 않고 백색왜성에서 탈출하세요.
description.spanish: Escapa de una estrella enana blanca sin disparar ni embestirla.
description.schinese: 逃离白矮星，且未射中或撞击它。
description.tchinese: 逃離白矮星，且未射中或撞擊它。
description.russian: Спаситесь от белого карлика, не обстреливая и не тараня его.
description.japanese: 射撃や体当たりせずに白色わい星から逃げる
description.portuguese: Foge de um anão branco sem disparares ou abalroá-lo.
description.polish: Ucieknij przed białym karłem, nie strzelając w niego i nie taranując go.
description.danish: Undslip en hvid dværg uden at skyde eller ramme den.
description.dutch: Ontsnap aan een witte dwerg, zonder hem te beschieten of te rammen.
description.finnish: Pakene valkoiselta kääpiöltä ampumatta sitä tai törmäämättä siihen.
description.norwegian: Kom deg unna en hvit dverg uten å skyte eller ramme den ned.
description.swedish: Fly från en vit dvärg utan att skjuta eller ramma den.
description.turkish: Ateş etmeden veya sıkıştırmadan beyaz cüceden kaç.
description.brazilian: Escapar uma anã branca sem atirar nela ou atingi-la.

description.english: Survive after being fully enveloped by a bomb trap.
description.german: Überlebe die Explosion einer Bombenfalle (dein Schiff muss mitten in der Explosion sein).
description.french: Survivre après avoir été pris tout entier dans la déflagration d'une bombe.
description.italian: Sopravvivi dopo essere stato completamente avvolto da una trappola-bomba.
description.koreana: 폭탄 트랩에 완전히 갇힌 후 살아남으세요.
description.spanish: Sobrevive tras quedar totalmente envuelto por una trampa bomba.
description.schinese: 在被炸弹陷阱完全笼罩后幸存。
description.tchinese: 在被炸彈陷阱完全籠罩後倖存。
description.russian: Полностью попадите в радиус взрыва бомбы-ловушки и выживите.
description.japanese: 爆破トラップに完全に巻き込まれるが生き残る。
description.portuguese: Sobrevive depois de teres sido completamente envolvido por uma armadilha com bomba.
description.polish: Przeżyj mimo pełnego objęcia przez pułapkę bombową.
description.danish: Overlev et angreb fra en bombefælde.
description.dutch: Blijf in leven na volledig omringd te zijn door een bomval.
description.norwegian: Vær omringet av en bombefelle og overlev.
description.swedish: Överlev efter att ha blivit helt innesluten av en bombfälla.
description.turkish: Bomba tuzağıyla tamamen kuşatıldıktan sonra hayatta kal.
description.brazilian: Sobreviver depois de ser totalmente envolvido por uma armadilha de bomba.

displayName.french: Rira bien qui rira le dernier !

description.english: Kill 20 enemies with security guns in a single level.
description.german: Besiege 20 Gegner mit Abwehrgeschützen in einer einzigen Zone.
description.french: Tuer 20 ennemis avec des tourelles de sécurité dans un niveau.
description.italian: Uccidi 20 nemici con armi della sicurezza in un solo livello.
description.koreana: 단일 레벨에서 호신용 총으로 적 20명을 죽이세요.
description.spanish: Mata a 20 enemigos con armas de seguridad en un mismo nivel.
description.schinese: 在一个关卡中用安全炮轰死20个敌人。
description.tchinese: 在一個關卡中用安保砲轟死20個敵人。
description.russian: На одном уровне убейте 20 противников с помощью защитных пушек.
description.japanese: 1つのレベルで20の敵を警備砲塔で倒す。
description.portuguese: Mata 20 inimigos com armas de segurança num único nível.
description.polish: Zabij 20 wrogów z wieżyczek strażniczych na jednym poziomie.
description.danish: Dræb 20 fjender med maskingeværer på et enkelt niveau.
description.dutch: Dood in één level 20 vijanden met beveiligingsgeweren.
description.finnish: Tapa 20 vihollista turva-aseilla yhden tason aikana.
description.norwegian: Drep 20 fiender med kanontårn på samme nivå.
description.swedish: Döda 20 fiender med säkerhetsvapen i en nivå.
description.turkish: Tek bir seviyede güvenlik silahlarıyla 20 düşman öldür.
description.brazilian: Matar 20 inimigos com armas de segurança num único nível.

description.english: Have 20 cells at one time on the Metal-Beam shield.
description.german: Verfüge gleichzeitig über 20 Energiezellen in deinem Metall-Strahlen-Schild.
description.french: Avoir 20 cellules simultanément sur le bouclier laser métallique.
description.italian: Accumula 20 celle sullo scudo raggio-metallo.
description.koreana: 메탈빔 쉴드에 셀 20개를 한 번에 보유하세요.
description.spanish: Ten al mismo tiempo 20 celdas en el escudo de rayos de metal.
description.schinese: 金属光束盾上同时有 20 颗电池。
description.tchinese: 金屬光束盾上同時有 20 顆電池。
description.russian: Накопите за раз 20 ячеек на своем металлическо-лучевом щите.
description.japanese: メタル ビーム シールドに20セルつける。
description.portuguese: Tem 20 células em qualquer altura no escudo de Raio e Metal.
description.polish: Miej 20 komórek naraz na swojej tarczy typu metal-promień.
description.danish: Udstyr dit metalstråleskjold med 20 energiceller.
description.dutch: Verzamel 20 cellen op het Metal-Beam-schild.
description.norwegian: Ha 20 celler samtidig på Metall-stråleskjoldet.
description.swedish: Ha 20 celler samtidigt på Metal-Beam-skölden.
description.turkish: Metal Işın kalkanında tek seferde 20 hücreye sahip ol.
description.brazilian: Ter 20 unidades ao mesmo tempo no escudo de Raio e Metal.

displayName.french: Les missiles aussi ont besoin d'Amour

description.english: Make two Power-Metal missiles collide.
description.german: Lasse zwei Macht-Metall-Geschosse kollidieren.
description.french: Faire entrer 2 missiles métalliques puissants en collision.
description.italian: Fai scontrare due missili potenza-metallo.
description.koreana: 파워메탈 미사일 2개를 서로 충돌시키세요.
description.spanish: Haz que choquen dos misiles de energía-metal.
description.schinese: 让两颗强力金属导弹碰撞。
description.tchinese: 让兩顆強力金屬飛彈碰撞。
description.russian: Заставьте две сило-металлические ракеты столкнуться.
description.japanese: 2つのパワー メタル ミサイルを衝突させる。
description.portuguese: Faz com que dois mísseis de Poder e Metal colidam.
description.polish: Doprowadź do zderzenia dwóch pocisków typu moc-metal.
description.danish: Få to kraftmetalmissiler til at kollidere.
description.dutch: Laat twee Power-Metal-projectielen met elkaar botsen.
description.norwegian: Få to Kraft-metallmissiler til å krasje.
description.swedish: Få två Power-Metal-missiler att krocka.
description.turkish: İki Güç Metali füzesini çarpıştır.
description.brazilian: Fazer dois mísseis de Poder e Metal colidirem.
